title: Virtual World-Based Simulation Training for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and understanding of patient care processes
context.additional_context: Blended education combining virtual environments (e.g., Second Life) with offline workshops for medical simulation training

learning_goals: Learners perform diabetes patient diagnosis simulations in a virtual environment with 80%+ accuracy.
Learners enhance real-time communication skills with peers and virtual patients using virtual collaboration tools.
Over 75% of participants improve their learning confidence during medical scenario-based problem-solving processes.

resources: Virtual World Platform (e.g., Second Life) Licenses

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
